tool.name: Box
tool.description: : This class sets the center and the size of a rectangular parallelepiped box around a set of residues or a pocket.

param.name: input_pdb_path
param.label: input PDB,PQR file
param.help: PDB file containing a selection of residue numbers or PQR file containing the pocket. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: outname_output_pdb_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: PDB including the annotation of the box center and size as REMARKs Format: [output].pdb

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: offset
param.label: offset
param.help: Extra distance (Angstroms) between the last residue atom and the box boundary.

param.name: box_coordinates
param.label: box_coordinates
param.help: Add box coordinates as 8 ATOM records.
